subject: Basketball
Basketball (College)
National Invitation Tournament
lead_paragraph: Dion Waiters had 17 points, Kris Joseph and James Southerland each had 15, and No. 5 Syracuse beat Manhattan, 92-56, in the N.I.T. Season Tip-Off.
snippet: Dion Waiters had 17 points, Kris Joseph and James Southerland each had 15, and No. 5 Syracuse beat Manhattan, 92-56, in the N.I.T. Season Tip-Off.
